rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR"
mkdir -p "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python2" mkdir -p "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python3"
bh_python_install --py2 --root "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python2" bh_python_install --py3 --root "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/python3"
cd "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR"
mv python2/usr/bin/html2text python2/usr/bin/html2markdown.py2 mv python3/usr/bin/html2text python3/usr/bin/html2markdown.py3
